Barry::BadData

Barry::BadData Class Reference
[Exceptions]

#include <error.h>

Inheritance diagram for Barry::BadData:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Thrown by record classes if their data is invalid and cannot be uploaded to the Blackberry.
